data.name: Cache Overload
data.detailed_description:
Have you ever wanted to fight robots? Look no further! This game is an FPS with parkour-style movement in the year 2041, where the characters are robots with different abilities. Explore through various maps and game modes with friends or other robots around the globe! In this game, you can expect intense fights, where you shoot your way to victory!

Game Modes

In Cache Overload, you will play through various game modes. Here is a list of the current game modes, which can and probably will be updated in the future.

Mechanical Mayhem
All of the players go onto one of the maps, where the goal is to be the last robot or team standing.
Bomb Defusal
The attackers plant the bomb, and the defenders either defuse or stop the attackers from planting. If the bomb isn't defused in time, the attackers win, but if it is the defenders win.
Kill them all!
The team of robots with the most kills before the time limit will win the game.
Parkour
Reach the finish line without dying, or getting killed! The player with the most kills and reaches the finish line will win the game.

Maps

There are currently 5 maps available, but will probably be updated. The maps are designed to be larger than normal, so the players have much space to parkour through the designs of the level with the fast-paced movement.

The Temple of Osiris
Overgroth
Warp
Rauwien

Abilities

Each robot has a different ability, and they all have different perks.
Venüs has Penta Jump! Since the maps are so large, this will help more than it sounds.
Commodore has Security Breach. He hacks into the network and slows down the other players!
Mono has the world's loudest speakers, turning him into the sound terminator!
Cyclops uses an intense laser, which will greatly damage the other players.

Weapons


There will be a lot of weapons, but you can get custom skins for each one.
There will be three subsections, where you can only have one of each in your inventory!
The subsections are melee, light, and heavy weapons.

data.short_description: Cache Overload is a fast-paced multi-player FPS taking place in Earth, 2041, as robots. Battle with your friends or other robots on the globe inside various maps and game modes.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Intel 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 1080
  • DirectX: Version 8.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
